website_summaries.verdict: One of the all-around best pool noodles you can buy in terms of durability and weight support.
pros: Extra-large diameter for excellent body support and comfort
Built to withstand UV rays and pool chemicals
Customers love the noodle's ultra-soft foam
cons: Customers complained of a lack of consistency in the product, especially in between the different colors

customer_reviews.title: Consistant quality issue
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these and each one was slightly different. The red one was the longest and just felt like an overall better product. The green one was the second best about 2" shorter than the red. The blue one was terrible. It was the shortest and the diameter was about 3/4" smaller. The skin on the blue one was very wrinkly. I sent the blue one back for a replacement. That is the reason for my 3 star review. It was a hassel to have to exchange one. If they were all like the red one I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Madrid

customer_reviews.title: Not for the beach
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife who was looking for more buoyancy in the gulf of Mexico. My first impression was that it heavy. The second thing we noticed that it is a sand magnet. Lastly, the skin is getting tears after a couple of weeks. Can not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t really say WOW
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these, the red one was 2inches longer and good quality. The blue one was smaller and there were numerous bare spots where the foam was not covered by latex which will cause it to absorb water than stop being a float. I would not buy this brand, due to poor quality control at a high price.
customer_reviews.author: meagain

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product if it would not split
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for the 4th of July weekend and this one is already splitting. Wonderful product if it would not split. The other one I ordered, if it stays together, will be a 5 star, for I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to get this for my water aerobics, but after using it twice, the seams started ripping out. I wouldn't buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: she was super excited but after 1 week of use the center ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter because she's allergic to the cheap Wal-Mart foam noodles. When we received this product, she was super excited but after 1 week of use the center of it flattened completely. We never left it in the pool when we weren't swimming and we stored it out of the sun. So, we can't figure out what went wrong. We're all really disappointed. I won't be buying these again. Total bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Vega

customer_reviews.title: Very durable.  Floats an adult and a child comfortably. My first one is on it’s 3rd summer with no issues.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. This is my 2nd one like it. I did have a minor flaw on this one. The end patch is a large super strong sticker (so to speak). It didn’t get out on just perfectly centered so a small piece of the outer edge got folded under that adhesive. It did make a small tear in the outer glossy finish but it wasn’t enough to return it.
customer_reviews.author: N DeWeese

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - pulling apart after first use.
customer_reviews.text: Received 3 floats on May 2nd. Opened our pool and wanted to use these. They are of inferior quality. Seam is pulling apart on one of them and the bottom pads are pulling away from the tube. Would not buy again. Only opened our pool a couple weeks ago and can't return because the last day to request a return was June 1.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S

customer_reviews.title: Easily keeps an adult floating on the water.
customer_reviews.text: I had two noodles from a purchase elsewhere and wanted two more but couldn't find them so I purchased two WOW brand. They work just as well as my previous two noodles. I can put my arms over them or put them between my legs and both ways one noodle will keep me afloat while mostly in the water. I would recommend these to someone who wants to float in the water while keeping mostly in the water. One other note about the quality. They appear to have a heavy rubberized shiny coating on them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: covered in adhesive residue
customer_reviews.text: These floats were exactly as expected except the cardboard product packaging was held in place with ridiculously tenacious tape with left adhesive residue on the pool float which could only be removed with acetone or the solvent goo-be gone. I would recommend not ordering this product unless you have access to these solvents and don't mind spending a few minutes cleaning the residue off of the floats and your fingers.
customer_reviews.author: H Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I decided on this product because of the size and comfort o the material it is made from. I had used a similar one during my aquatic physical therapy. However after one or two uses, the noodle bends in half and never recovers! I was not surprised the one used by my therapist became limp and bent as it was used by multiple patients. However I was very disappointed that mine became flimsy & unsupportive so quickly, especially as it is more expensive than the cheap foam noodles. I now have a $12 foam noodle which has worked better!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Stiller

customer_reviews.title: We just love this one
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a replacement for one at our pool. We just love this one. It is very sturdy and will not absorb the water the way our old one did. Color is very bright and will definitely order another one before the end of summer.
customer_reviews.author: allen smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice and supple. Great first impression.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for the first couple of months. The jury is still out on this for durability. It’s a very pricey pool toy and I bought it because the cheap noodles shed after only a short time. This won’t shed, it’s not an uncoated foam product. There is an odor that seems like it might be a plasticizer and when the odor is gone, the toy will become brittle and crack. There are end caps that are glued on and the glue doesn’t seem the be holding perfectly. If the seal fails, the tube will aspirate water
customer_reviews.author: E. E. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Real green for a little green...
customer_reviews.text: This noodle arrived in a timely fashion and was in a sturdy long box. The float performs as advertised. The ends seem like the only place that water could leach into the inner foam, but so far that has not been an issue as the ends remain sealed. The photos in the listing are accurate in color. The finish is easy to hold onto in the pool. However, the finish has kind of a tacky feel. Not bad, just different than my other noodles. All in all, this is a pretty good pool toy.
customer_reviews.author: 4 good product

customer_reviews.title: Regular pool noodle on steroids- heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for a large pool noodle, it seems like the only noodles you can find are the super skinny cheap ones. This pool noodle is on steroids, it must weight close to 10 pounds. It's super heavy duty and comfortable to float with in the pool. It is shorter than your normal pool noodle, but it is close to three times as thick. It feels very premium, let's see how long it holds up. For the price I am glad it is so heavy duty and nice.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: WOW IS NOT WOW! Don’t Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in these products. We have bought six and we’re lucky if we get a month of use from each. They crack and suck up water making virtually useless. We store them in a bin when not in use and just float on them. We even received one in the box that was cracked (it was quickly replaced). I attached a picture that shows that they’re stuffed like a sausage in a this plastic bag so when the outer layer cracks it just fills with water and becomes a lead weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ojii-san

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little Extra for a Fluid Aquatic
customer_reviews.text: It is cheap and the outer layer is peeling off after a few weeks. We have a great one from Fluid Aquatic and we thought this was similar and would save us a few dollars. The Fluid Aquatic is in it's second year and no peeling at all. Cheap is not always better for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: Splitting at the seam
customer_reviews.text: As the title says. Only a few weeks and it's already coming apart. UPDATE: 08/31/2020 Finally had to throw it away...it basically exploded. These things are pretty pricy but they seem to have a design flaw where water penetrates and destroys it from the inside. As you can see...having all these foamy pieces in your pool is no party. I always take these out and store them in the shade, so I think these just aren't of high quality. I have two others (Green/Red) and they are holding up OK (they don't hold their shape anymore). I won't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kazam

customer_reviews.title: falls apart quickly
customer_reviews.text: bought this exactly 1 month ago and the rubberized covering is already splitting both at the seems and elsewhere...according to Amazon the return period was limited..what a SCAM!! Tried to call Amazon only to be told the phone line was not being used due to "social distancing"...???seriously? phones can't be answered at home? hmmmm!! do NOT buy this pool noodle..
customer_reviews.author: Allison D. Harris

customer_reviews.title: One out of 3 was a dud
customer_reviews.text: This was our first year with a pool and a friend recommended these noodles as THE BEST and most durable. We ordered 2 and sadly, one started cracking and splitting as pictured above within the first 3 weeks. I missed the return window on Amazon and honestly we love the other one so much I ordered another....just bummed that we seem to have purchased a lemon. For $30 I could have bought 30 dollar store noodles for the same amount of time. Still recommend the product as it is a great float, but upset we got a seemingly rare defective noodle.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: This pool noodle fell apart and filled up with water 2 hours after we put it in the pool. You don't expect this from a pool noodle that costs nearly 40 bucks!! DO NOT BUY, THIS IS A DISAPPOINTMENT AND HUGE WASTE OF MONEY!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pool Noodle
customer_reviews.text: This is so nice - it's a beautiful bright sad of purple. It's BIG and long. It's good quality and will probably last a long time. It's great for all ages and sizes too - 2which is great cuz my 4 1/2 year old niece loves it. It floats great holding up weight over 240lbs. Very happy with this "Pool Noodle" so far!
customer_reviews.author: MissyMe

customer_reviews.title: It was an okay purchase. Cheaper at Costco
customer_reviews.text: From the measurements I thought it would be bigger than the other pool noodles that I have bought of the same type from Costco. It is the exact same size. The ones from Costco or to 4 for 30, so $15 each. And I much prefer the colorful ones from Costco.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Fun Float superior to Wow
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these and two by Fun Float to get a variety of colors. The noodle by Fun Float, while costing $10 more, is a superior product. For example, the Wow noodle is not solid foam from end to end (the interior material shifts from end to end) while the Fun Float noodle is solid all the way (it feels more substantial but is still soft). So I bought another one by Fun Float.
customer_reviews.author: Todd E. Jennings

customer_reviews.title: From Great to crap.....
customer_reviews.text: When the product arrived it seemed perfect, kids loved it. Now 2 months, the outer case has split from one end to the other. So instead of a nice blue its showing the white inside. Don't buy as they split. Seems like a lots of money for a pool float that splits after such a short time.
customer_reviews.author: MR C A COUSINS

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for shoddy quality
customer_reviews.text: This noodle has literally thousands of tiny rubber pieces inside it. How do we know? Because it split open and we spent an hour picking the pieces off the lawn and out of the pool. Other floats we have purchased all had solid cores. God knows where this came from and what was in the thousands of rubber pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long... at all!
customer_reviews.text: This only lasted about an hour or two of play! The end just popped off. Will Obviously be sending back! Hoping it was just a fluke!
customer_reviews.author: victy

customer_reviews.title: I wish they had not gone cheap
customer_reviews.text: Finding anything in latex foam is expensive. I had a set of latex foam floats I bought a few years ago that were eaten by the dog, so I ordered new ones. These are not latex all the way through. There seems to be an inner core of something else - maybe Styrofoam peanuts based on the sound/feel??? The result is a product that still floats, but loses structural integrity and float ability. Would have appreciated them being about 4 inches longer as well.
customer_reviews.author: chikinsR4dinner

customer_reviews.title: Best Floaty Around
customer_reviews.text: Have 2 of these now. Will be getting 2 more next summer. Everyone, including the 5 year old wants these over any of the other floats, rings, lounge, etc. You can relax, just having this under your arms (submersed from chest down) or sitting astride (submersed from waist down). Keeps everyone from children who can swim to adults afloat. Allows you to stay cool and enjoy the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to  puncture holes in the rubber!
customer_reviews.text: You have to be very careful as it does not take much to poke holes in it. The rubber protective barrier is extremely thin. Only used it twice and found a puncture or two. Amazingly soft and my granddaughter seems to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Popo

customer_reviews.title: Made in Taiwan & China
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these on separate occasions - both through Amazon One says it was made in China- this one has a thicker plastic coating on the outside & is much more durable then the second one we purchased which says it was made in Taiwan. The second one had a thinner plastic coating & is much softer & more prone to coming apart
customer_reviews.author: Its My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these but arrived in separate shipments. After 2 months and my window to return is closed, they are splitting at the seam. Poor quality on these. I have purchased blue ones in the passed and have used for several seasons with no issue
customer_reviews.author: WS

customer_reviews.title: Terrible for the price! See pictures!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these floats with high expectations (especially for the cost) and they did not even make it through 2 months. Only my wife and I have used these and probably under 10 times total. You can see how they have busted apart. I highly recommend buying a different noodle as this one has failed.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is great for an adult to use in a pool, very well made, only thing I didn't like is there was a coupon the day I purchased-(I bought 3) and I could only get the discount on 1 noodle, even though it didn't say anything about 1 coupon per item. Still very happy with this product. Don't compare this to the ones you can buy in the dollar store. I am a solid 240 pounds & it kept me afloat with no problem. def would buy again & recommend for kids
customer_reviews.author: Adrian R.

customer_reviews.title: Hole in Outer Layer
customer_reviews.text: Actually received the product with a small hole in the outer layer. Used it in the pool once and the inner foam/sponge absorbed so much water it weighed about 5 times as much and has not been the same since. The cost was $39.95 and the product should be more durable for that cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen L. Antinoro

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these. 3 were wonderful and shipped together, the last one shipped from China and was smaller, flimsy, and a different color. I need 4 so might try again and see if I can get the original ones. Just now that they should be a darker blue and very firm--they don't bend when you hold them on the end like the defective one does.
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for weak swimmers in open water
customer_reviews.text: This is a mandatory float for us to take to the lake for those who are weaker or heavier swimmers that need a floatie. It is so valuable that even after ours drifted away in the night to never again be found, I replaced it the moment I got back home. As a very valuable use during the off season, I keep this on the back edge of the washer/dryer unit so I can fold clothes on top and not lose socks or rags down the back. It works great to keep things from falling down.
customer_reviews.author: D Wildflower

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh...
customer_reviews.text: We will see if it holds up. VERY squishy. Not very sturdy. It feels like egg crate foam rolled up and then vulcanized. I do not think its worth the high price tag.
customer_reviews.author: EMTUSS

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: In the reviews, many mentioned that the blue ones came defective so I must have lucked out. Both of the blue ones I got are not defective. I bought to replace one we had for years and even though it's a different name brand, the quality seems like it's going to last us years.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen h.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Float
customer_reviews.text: These noodles are great! They are shorter in length than traditional pool noodles, but much wider making them easier to transport in the car. They are smooth to the touch and somewhat soft, but most importantly really buoyant. We've taken them to the subdivision pool and the river, and they held up great on all adventures, being drug along, pounced on, tossed on riverbanks...mud wipes away with a simple dip into the water. Super fun noodle!
customer_reviews.author: Stormy W

customer_reviews.title: Just a month of Use and they are ripping at the seam! UGH!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 new Noodles in early May - we broke them out for Memorial Day weekend. They get put away in the shed every night - never stored outside - yesterday we noticed two out of the 4 are ripping at the seam - the red one was $39.37 and the blue was $32.13 - the 2 green ones seem to be holding up okay right now. For the cost of them they shouldn't be breaking after one months use. I would like to either get a reimbursement or have new ones shipped to me - we'll see if the company has customer service. I sure hope so.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly H. Fedorko

customer_reviews.title: Starting to wear very quicckly
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for 2 months now and they are already starting to deteriorate. I keep them inside out of the sun when we are not in the pool, one of the three noodles I received even had a defect from the factory. at this price I am not happy with this purchase, I ended up getting similar pool noodles from Costco for cheaper that are holding up better.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with kids of all ages!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves these pool noodles. They are not cheep by any means but well worth the investment. They are soft and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for anyone wanting to float in the pool or lake.
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are perfect to exercise in the pool. Much better than the skinny noodles our kids used for used. My husband and I can float on these for hours in the pool or the lake. I ride it like a bicycle and get my exercises in. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Spyingdragonflies

customer_reviews.title: Superior addition to our pool floats
customer_reviews.text: This noodle is doing well in our in our bromine hot tub. The standard pool noodles tend to fall apart within a couple of months. I like that this noodle provides a strong resistence for doing pool pushups or just lounging. The skin has a smooth pleasant feel.
customer_reviews.author: D. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great quality when purchased new.  Be careful if buying used.
customer_reviews.text: Careful on what is considered very good condition if buying used. I bought two and one was exactly that very good. The second had a large cut through one end making it useless junk. That one is being returned. We love the other.
customer_reviews.author: mt

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these , WOW so not worth the money . I have several spots where the foam is totally flat like it is gone , the seams are coming apart . Hasn’t even lasted me a month . I would not purchase these . Wish I would have read reviews first . 😞
customer_reviews.author: Tink

customer_reviews.title: Best Pool Noodle
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. In fact, we liked it so much we bought a 2nd one. 2nd season with them and they have held up well after near daily use. Just prefer these solid core noodles to the cheap foam ones. Can do many exercises or just float around at our leisure.
customer_reviews.author: PSY

customer_reviews.title: Great Floatation
customer_reviews.text: I read somewhere they should last 10 years. I'm 240 and it holds me afloat easily... I like them so much I bought 4 different colors (BJ's Wholesale club in Tampa sells them for 1/2 the price Amazon charges, found that out this summer)
customer_reviews.author: Walter Jasniewski

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth $40
customer_reviews.text: We've only used these a few times in the past two months but yesterday one went flat...I'm pretty angry. The cheap ones at dollar general last longer than these do. I would return it but we've surpassed the 30 days. Why did it go flat!?! Why wouldn't you make it slolid!?! How long till my other one goes flat!?!
customer_reviews.author: Alysia Rose

customer_reviews.title: Comes apart too easily.
customer_reviews.text: These are big, sturdy appearing, and comfortable in the pool. Unfortunately, after just a few months, Using them no more than once a week, they are starting to come apart. Very disappointing for a product at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald S.

customer_reviews.title: This isn't worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I thought I was getting a quality product, but this pool noodle decompresses when you're using it. We've had Fluid brand soft foam noodles in the past, and those didn't get "limp" until the third year. After using this noodle for less than a month and it already started folding in the middle where we leaned on it. It also has a distinct unpleasant odor. After 3 months of use, it is splitting at the seam. Such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: walter dobravolsky

customer_reviews.title: Terrible material, doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product. My mom uses hers for exercising and floating and has had hers for years. I have only had product for a month and it is already ruined. There are cracks in it and it no longer floats well. I only use mine to float around the pool. I guess I have a dud 😒
customer_reviews.author: momofsix

customer_reviews.title: like someones nail went through it
customer_reviews.text: There was a small cut in outter product, like someones nail went through it....I will need a return label to send it back for a replacement ASAP. I will mark the spot. I noticed it when I was in the pool already. Please contact me.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Celestino

customer_reviews.title: floats but gets waterlogged
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these and they were just a little more than Costco. I missed buying them at Costco. After 1/2 hour in the water they were waterlogged. not what I expected...Would I buy them again? NO
customer_reviews.author: Hygienegirl

customer_reviews.title: Lake must have
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 of these we take out on our boat to use on the lake. Very buoyant, sometimes it’s tricky to get it between your legs! As an adult, this is my preferred floatie of choice. Sturdy but not confining.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Vollmer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: We will not be buying this floating again. We used it one time and the inside separated so it’s puffy in both ends, but the middle is flat. We got one from Costco a couple years ago and it has held its form. We will be going back to Costco for next years.
customer_reviews.author: aml

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Ended up buying 2 on separate orders since we liked so much!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Can face forward putting arms on top of or can put under neck with arms on top of. Material will stick to same type of material so we have to to separately but we do have to fold over to fit in boat compartment and only takes a minute to return to straight shape. My daughter is 100 lbs and I'm 200 lbs. Works for both of us.
customer_reviews.author: PolzinB

customer_reviews.title: Juno
customer_reviews.text: These cannot even hold up someone that’s 120Lbs they looked Solid & very sturdy but complete JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: Greg C

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: After one week of use the noodle is peeling. $40 for a noodle-very disappointed. I purchased a nicer noodle so it wouldn't be peeling off in the pool like cheaper models. Don't bother wasting your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Post

customer_reviews.title: Thin and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This is a big disappointment. I was hoping this would be an addition to another heavy duty noodle called the Big Dipper. This is very flimsy. It is very thin diameter wise,and I don't see any use for it.
customer_reviews.author: genna

customer_reviews.title: Fairly Priced
customer_reviews.text: Colors are great, have had them now for two month in the 100 degree sun. Family loves them Company is fair and communicates really well. Go here for all you pool toys
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the cheap small foam noodles that deteriorates over time in the sun. We bought this one to match a similar one we bought at Costco a few years back by a different manufacture. This one just as good as that one. We will be buying a second one in red to add to our collection and the fully replace all the cheap foam ones.
customer_reviews.author: kckc

customer_reviews.title: This devise was great. It really does the job and more that ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this sitting floating device when we went to the fresh water spring in Florida. Since the waters are so deep you have to have a floating device to be in the water for a long period of time. This devise was great. It really does the job and more that one person can use it. We loved using it, definitely recommend getting for any floating situation.
customer_reviews.author: gigi

customer_reviews.title: Pool Noodles
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in great condition. The first time they were used, in our pool - by adults, one of them started to come apart on the end. The outside covering had pulled away from the end cap in 3 places and had already torn. It’s not from misuse or abuse. It simply wasn’t made well. The second one is still like new. Maybe I got a defective one. I’m not sure but because of this would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Dull and smaller then the other one I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two, one blue and one red. The blue one is thicker and has a nice gloss look to it. The red one however is dull. A wee bit smaller too. Pretty disappointed. They should be the same.
customer_reviews.author: Beate Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart second time in the water
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers have stated, these ripped at the seam very quickly. I purchased 2 of these on Prime Day for a birthday party on that upcoming Saturday. They were delivered on Thursday and got used twice. By Sunday morning, my husband noticed several holes where the latex ripped along the seam. I would strongly recommend buying a different brand!
customer_reviews.author: Becky P

customer_reviews.title: Softest pool noodle!!!
customer_reviews.text: At first I felt a little rediculous buying such a pricey pool noodle. But once it came in the mail and I felt how soft it was I was happy. I had such a great time in the ocean and I’ll have this noodle for many summer’s to come.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for the price that the quality would be great. I can tell you that it is. The outer coating is heavy duty compared to the cheap ones in find in five below or Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Djones

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: These last a long time if you care for them and are way easier than a float or foam noodles. I think they are a bit expensive but when you consider seller’s shipping cost, worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ALH

customer_reviews.title: Splitting at seam after 3 gentle uses
customer_reviews.text: These noodles are great at first but I am super bummed to report after 3 gentle uses one of the two noodles I purchased is already splitting along the seam (see image). For the cost I was expected to get at least a summer out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Katie F.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Matches exactly with descriptions. Last longer than the usual floating foam noodles. Colours are intense. Don’t smell and dry very fast. I bought 5 of them.
customer_reviews.author: nine ginger

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all summer!
customer_reviews.text: It holds me up in the deep end of the pool. I ride it like a bicycle for a great water workout. It does not seem to be deteriorating like the noodles I have used in the past..........and it is so soft!
customer_reviews.author: KAREN S CANTLEY

customer_reviews.title: Great pool noodle
customer_reviews.text: Kids and adults (even men around 200lbs) alike love this noodle. It is much better than the flimsy foam ones. I wish it wasn’t quite as expensive, but it has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: JReeves

customer_reviews.title: Not really made for pool toy as much as a sport product!!
customer_reviews.text: Too soft!! I thought it would be harder and sturdier to be able to stretch on. Its more of a float. Not able to withstand sun so be careful it will melt if left out.
customer_reviews.author: Demme Matheos

customer_reviews.title: WOW  POOL NOODLES
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these and really love them. However, They seem to get holes and we don't know why. We store them inside when we aren't using them. Not sure why this is happening.
customer_reviews.author: BLS

customer_reviews.title: Leaks air and goes flat
customer_reviews.text: Used it horseriding style and leaks air out of the end, goes flat. Still usable, bu if we wanted a flat float, wouldn’t have spent the money on this round, now flat one.
customer_reviews.author: Bud. Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy... Fell apart in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from the photo this came apart after only 2 months. These are not worth the money. Sad because prior to coming apart they were nice but it didn't last. :(
customer_reviews.author: svknight

customer_reviews.title: The ones' in the past were great, this one failed.
customer_reviews.text: This one failed, ends started coming off, and then it failed. The other two bought shortly after, still going strong! Not sure what happened. Would love a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: George Marshall

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THESE! I bought this on August 14th and got them on the 16th and they are already peeling. Today is Sept 5th. Absolute junk! My other ones from Costco have lasted for years! I'm requesting a refund and will never buy this brand again! They want $40 for these and they peel within 3 weeks or you can get them at Costco for $19.95!
customer_reviews.author: miller miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable float.
customer_reviews.text: Float is very soft and comfortable, great for lounging in the pool. Have owned one before, just make sure to store out of direct sunlight to prolong life and prevent damage from UV rays.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley K. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Worked well and now we have a small tear in the outer material, no idea how and the water seems to get in and makes it shaped very weird in the middle like it’s deflated. Gonna try some gorilla tape and hope for the best
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea M Carter

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Started peeling the first day we used them! Beware of this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Yarber

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant about ordering this because of the reviews. But these have held up great for us. We got 2 reds- havent had any issues yet- hopefully they last a few summers!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Fox

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Used this ONE TIME and there is a hole in it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hilas

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in April of this year. This is expensive and now July 2020 after used a few times a week the tube is starting to come apart. This is not worth the money $30 plus dollars you can buy cheaper ones that would last all summer long.
customer_reviews.author: atomant

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: So far this is holding up well. Haven’t had a lot of time to use. More time next summer and will update this review at that time
customer_reviews.author: Denise DeGlopper

customer_reviews.title: Not as Durable as it claims.
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome except my daughter (2) dragged it to the pool and it’s already broken the ends up. Expected something more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Riera

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Ooooh. I love this noodle. Very sturdy unlike the chap ones you get at target or Walmart. The cost is higher that it should be. Costco had them a few months ago for $25
customer_reviews.author: Shoo

customer_reviews.title: VERY POOR QUALITY !
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. After just 4 weeks it has completely split in half. I have bought foam noodles before and they have lasted a full year, some even longer. This product quality is really poor and it lasted just 4 weeks before splitting open. Very disappointing !!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Schnell

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, didn’t last even with Just adult gentle use for “floating”.
customer_reviews.text: We were very excited to receive this noodle, and enjoyed it for two months. Then, it started taking in water, because it became very heavy and became sunken in. Very disappointed, as it was pricey! We thought for the money we paid for it, that it should last a long time. :-(
customer_reviews.author: The Walkers

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy noodle
customer_reviews.text: This noodle is not nearly as dense as previous noodles I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: linda g. alyea

customer_reviews.title: Foam Large Noodle
customer_reviews.text: The picture stated it will yellow. So glad when I opened the package it was green! My favorite color. LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: steve kalaitzis

customer_reviews.title: Wow tube splittinng
customer_reviews.text: I bought 6 one is already splitting on the seem . I would like to return this one . I have 5 other that look ok.. how do i return.
customer_reviews.author: TOM COHEN

customer_reviews.title: Great for pools
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife but this is one of the pool toys others go to if you want to float in the water on a hot summer day. Very durable
customer_reviews.author: CarrOk

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This noodle broke in the center after 5 days. It hangs over my arm. I weigh 118lbs. I was the only one that has used it. If I'd of saved the box, I'd of sent it back ASAP. I'm so disappointed. What a waste of good money. Sherry
customer_reviews.author: sherry kathol

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived with what appeared to be a burn hole through exterior and seam had been burned apart. Amazon was incredible and delivered a replacement which arrived in 2 days and guess what? Replacement had a tear in the side wall! I just duct tapped and kept replacement as way too annoyed by quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Blue cover is very fragile & rips easily
customer_reviews.text: This is a super fun pool toy but this particular one has a thin skin and in just 2 month of use, the blue covering is already chipping off. This should not happen. Make sure to buy the original WOW brand. Not sure if this is a copy/fake.
customer_reviews.author: Anne R.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would really be a good product for our pool. It has been in the water very few times. It has already split down the seam. Certainly not worth what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Math teacher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent noodle for the pool
customer_reviews.text: Looked everywhere for the oversized noodles. This was the cheapest, and great quality and durability I. The AZ sun
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: WOW World of Watersports First Class Super Soft Foam Pool Noodles for Swimming and Floating, Pool Floats, Lake Floats
feature_bullets: Extra-large swimming pool noodle for support and more flotation, pool noodle can support up to 250 pounds, 5.5-inch-wide by 46 inches long. It is a perfect addition to your pool parties and weekend getaways

Thick swimming pool noodle with ribbed texture, soft luxurious foam for extra grip and non-slip makes floating comfortable and easy plus conforms to the body. A slip-proof textured floating foam with triple-dip vinyl coating
UV Resistant - Resistant to UV so protected against the sun, salt water, and pool chemicals
Heavy-Duty Performance - The fun pool float has heavy duty vinyl-coated for extra durability. Robust triple-dip vinyl on these swimming noodles ensures long lasting color.
Fun Pool Noodle - The fun pool float is great for kids and adults, in the pool, river or lake or for exercise

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
